body_html:
It happens to me as well.
In my case, I ran the following cmake command:

cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=C:\tools\swigwin-3.0.10\swig.exe -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:\Users\Pesquisa\Anaconda3\python.exe -DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:\Users\Pesquisa\Anaconda3\libs\python35.lib -Dtensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS=OFF -Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GRPC_SUPPORT=OFF

And I got the error:

CMake Error: The source directory "C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib" does not appear to contain CMakeLists.txt.

body:
It happens to me as well. 
In my case, I ran the following cmake command:

```sh
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=C:\tools\swigwin-3.0.10\swig.exe -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:\Users\Pesquisa\Anaconda3\python.exe -DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:\Users\Pesquisa\Anaconda3\libs\python35.lib -Dtensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS=OFF -Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GRPC_SUPPORT=OFF
```

And I got the error:

```sh
CMake Error: The source directory "C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib" does not appear to contain CMakeLists.txt.
```
